full_text: Espace Tricot is a yarn store in Montreal, Canada. Discover our yarns here! www.espacetricot.com The Bolton Pass Hat with its twisted rib and triangle motif is a nod to the majestic pass that cuts through the valley of the Sutton Mountains in the Eastern Townships region of Quebec. Meant to be worn with the mountain peak towards the side, this slouchy beanie knit with Sunday Morning, a luscious BFL-Masham blend, will keep you warm and toasty on a chilly day! YARN: Espace Tricot SUNDAY MORNING DK (75% Bluefaced Leicester, 25% Masham); 268 yds (245 m) / 100g 1 skein - shown in ‘Offline’ Or approximately 125 (150, 180) m / 137 (164, 197) y of a DK weight yarn.
